trans-unit.source: Represents a set of methods for creating metadata <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ItemCollection"></xref> instances.

Creates an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> and loads the metadata that is contained in the <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> that contains the metadata files.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError"></xref>.
Any errors that are generated during the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> creation are added to the list.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> that contains the specified metadata.

Creates an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> and loads the metadata that is contained in the <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> that contains the metadata files.
The property of <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityFrameworkVersions"></xref> that corresponds to the targeted version of the Entity Framework.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError"></xref>.
Any errors that are generated during the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> creation are added to the list.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> that contains the specified metadata.

Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> and loads the metadata that is contained in the specified <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref>, <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection"></xref>, and collection of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> objects.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> containing the metadata files.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError"></xref>.
Any errors generated during the <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> creation are added to the list.
A <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> that contains the specified metadata.

Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> from the mapping information in the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> objects and the metadata in the specified <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> and <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection"></xref> objects.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> containing the metadata files.
The property of <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityFrameworkVersions"></xref> that corresponds to the targeted version of the Entity Framework.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmSchemaError"></xref>.
Any errors generated during the <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> creation are added to the list.
A <xref href="System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection"></xref> that contains the specified metadata.
Constructs a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection"></xref> and provides a list of errors and warnings.
A collection of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> objects, each of which each reads from a storage model file.
The storage model file is written in the store schema definition language (SSDL).
A list of errors that were encountered while loading the SSDL metadata.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection"></xref> that provides a list of errors and warnings.
Constructs a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection"></xref> and provides a list of errors and warnings.
A collection of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> objects, each of which each reads from a storage model file.
The storage model file is written in the store schema definition language (SSDL).
The property of <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityFrameworkVersions"></xref> that corresponds to the targeted version of the Entity Framework.
A list of errors that were encountered while loading the SSDL metadata.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StoreItemCollection"></xref> that provides a list of errors and warnings.
